Translations.Text: He je Jeden created ona dust subsequently tiny kvapka potom z hanging zarodok potom He brings ona out dieta potom He lets ona zastihnut maturity potom ona become stara -some z ona umrel zavcas. Ona attain predetermined vek ona chapat
He bol iba Jeden controls zivot smrt. Do have anything robit He len says do Bol it bol
Ona noted those argue GOD's proofs a ako they have deviated
They je the jeden disbelieved scripture odkaz my sent our posol. Therefore they robit iste zalozit out
Puta je ich krk retaz bol pouzivat do zavliect them
Do Inferno potom do Zapalit they burn
They ziadat Kde bol idols ona pouzivat kult
beside GOD They say They zhyraly us. Skutocne when my kult them my kult nothing. Thus robit GOD send disbelievers astray
This ona pouzivat rejoice false doctrines zem ona pouzivat inzerovat them
Zapisat zavora Gehenna wherein ona abide forever Co chudobny destiny for arrogant jeden
Ona bol chory GOD's promise bol truth. My show ona some z (retribution) my promised them zakoncit tvoj zivot before ze, they spatny listok us
